pageContext.claim: “In Arizona, a sample of 100 ballots reviewed by a judge found that a very small percentage of these ballots -- very small, but when you look at it, it was turned out to be very large. It was tens of thousands of votes, more than we would've needed to win Arizona.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump citing a claim made by the chair of the Arizona Republican party -- she said 2% -- but her claim was rejected as incorrect and unverified.
